Brookhaven.WGCL-TV: WGCL-TV, virtual channel 46 (UHF digital channel 19), is a CBS-affiliated television station licensed to Atlanta, Georgia, United States. The station is owned by the Meredith Corporation, as part of a duopoly with independent station WPCH-TV (channel 17). The two stations share studios on 14th Street in northwestern Atlanta; WGCL-TV's transmitter is located near North Druid Hills.
